page.title: 09Farms and Farming.
page.content: Some of the farms are rented from the N.C.B. and these include Fox Lane Farm, Plane Tree Farm and Dovecote Farm. These have total acreages around 200. The Crown Farm is owned and farmed by the Durdy family. The Manor Farm, Harlington is owned and farmed by Mr Wade. The Manor Farm, Barnburgh and its land belonged to Lord Halifax but the farmstead was sold to Mr Burke,and the land, some 120 acres of parkland (Hickleton Park), is now sublet for grazing beef cattle. Since 1980 Centre Farm has ceased to function as a farm. The land was auctioned, and the farmhouse and stone out-buildings are at present being converted into five luxury homes.
